metadata.description:
A control flow decision is made based on The block hash of a previous block.
The block hash of a previous block is used to determine a control flow decision. Note that the values of variables like coinbase, gaslimit, block number and timestamp are predictable and can be manipulated by a malicious miner. Also keep in mind that attackers know hashes of earlier blocks. Don't use any of those environment variables as sources of randomness and be aware that use of these variables introduces a certain level of trust into miners.
metadata.title: Dependence on predictable environment variable

metadata.description:
A control flow decision is made based on The block.number environment variable.
The block.number environment variable is used to determine a control flow decision. Note that the values of variables like coinbase, gaslimit, block number and timestamp are predictable and can be manipulated by a malicious miner. Also keep in mind that attackers know hashes of earlier blocks. Don't use any of those environment variables as sources of randomness and be aware that use of these variables introduces a certain level of trust into miners.
metadata.title: Dependence on predictable environment variable

metadata.cwe: CWE-664: Improper Control of a Resource Through its Lifetime
metadata.message: Contracts should be deployed with the same compiler version and flags that they have been tested with thoroughly. Locking the pragma helps to ensure that contracts do not accidentally get deployed using, for example, an outdated compiler version that might introduce bugs that affect the contract system negatively.
metadata.name: floating-compiler-version

metadata.cwe: CWE-710: Improper Adherence to Coding Standards
metadata.message: Labeling the visibility for `ROLL_MODULO` makes it easier to catch incorrect assumptions about who can access the variable.
metadata.name: state-variable-default-visibility

metadata.cwe: CWE-710: Improper Adherence to Coding Standards
metadata.message: Labeling the visibility for `PERCENTAGE_DIVISOR` makes it easier to catch incorrect assumptions about who can access the variable.
metadata.name: state-variable-default-visibility

metadata.cwe: CWE-710: Improper Adherence to Coding Standards
metadata.message: Labeling the visibility for `PRIZE_PERCENTAGE` makes it easier to catch incorrect assumptions about who can access the variable.
metadata.name: state-variable-default-visibility

metadata.cwe: CWE-710: Improper Adherence to Coding Standards
metadata.message: Labeling the visibility for `PRIZE_FUND_PERCENTAGE` makes it easier to catch incorrect assumptions about who can access the variable.
metadata.name: state-variable-default-visibility

metadata.cwe: CWE-710: Improper Adherence to Coding Standards
metadata.message: Labeling the visibility for `PRIZE_FUND_SHARE` makes it easier to catch incorrect assumptions about who can access the variable.
metadata.name: state-variable-default-visibility

metadata.cwe: CWE-710: Improper Adherence to Coding Standards
metadata.message: Labeling the visibility for `PRIZE_RESET_SHARE` makes it easier to catch incorrect assumptions about who can access the variable.
metadata.name: state-variable-default-visibility

metadata.cwe: CWE-710: Improper Adherence to Coding Standards
metadata.message: Function `constructor` does not explicitly declare visibility, so it will have a default visibility of `public` and can be called by anyone.
metadata.name: function-default-visibility

metadata.cwe: CWE-347: Improper Verification of Cryptographic Signature
metadata.message: Same signature can be used multiple times to execute the `rollDice` function. This could result in unintended consequences if the signer's intention was to approve a transaction once.
metadata.name: missing-protection-against-signature-replay-attacks

metadata.cwe: CWE-284: Improper Access Control
metadata.message: Function `rollDice` lacks access control, making it accessible to anyone.
metadata.name: unprotected-ether-withdrawal

metadata.cwe: CWE-665: Improper Initialization
metadata.message: Be careful when using `send()`/`transfer()` or `call()`/`delegatecall()`/`staticcall()` with hardcoded gas amount.
metadata.name: message-call-with-hardcoded-gas-amount

metadata.cwe: CWE-703: Improper Check or Handling of Exceptional Conditions
metadata.message: External calls can fail accidentally or deliberately, which can cause a DoS condition in the contract.
metadata.name: dos-with-failed-call

metadata.cwe: CWE-682: Incorrect Calculation
metadata.message: The operation on variable `address(this).balance` could lead to overflow/underflow.
metadata.name: integer-overflow-underflow

metadata.cwe: CWE-682: Incorrect Calculation
metadata.message: The operation on variable `msg.value` could lead to overflow/underflow.
metadata.name: integer-overflow-underflow

metadata.cwe: CWE-347: Improper Verification of Cryptographic Signature
metadata.message: Same signature can be used multiple times to execute the `calculateRollResult` function. This could result in unintended consequences if the signer's intention was to approve a transaction once.
metadata.name: missing-protection-against-signature-replay-attacks

metadata.cwe: CWE-682: Incorrect Calculation
metadata.message: The operation on variable `keccak256(abi.encodePacked(blockhash(block.number - 1), nonce))` could lead to overflow/underflow.
metadata.name: integer-overflow-underflow

metadata.cwe: CWE-682: Incorrect Calculation
metadata.message: The operation on variable `uint256(keccak256(abi.encodePacked(blockhash(block.number - 1), nonce))` could lead to overflow/underflow.
metadata.name: integer-overflow-underflow

metadata.cwe: CWE-330: Use of Insufficiently Random Values
metadata.message: Using the value `uint256(keccak256(abi.encodePacked(blockhash(block.number - 1), nonce))) % ROLL_MODULO` is unsafe because it can be manipulated by miners.
metadata.name: weak-sources-of-randomness-from-chain-attributes

metadata.cwe: CWE-682: Incorrect Calculation
metadata.message: The operation on variable `block.number` could lead to overflow/underflow.
metadata.name: integer-overflow-underflow

metadata.cwe: CWE-829: Inclusion of Functionality from Untrusted Control Sphere
metadata.message: Be careful when using the `block` attribute in smart contracts. Especially when using `block.timestamp` and `block.number` as conditions to execute an action.
metadata.name: timestamp-dependency

metadata.cwe: CWE-682: Incorrect Calculation
metadata.message: The operation on variable `address(this).balance` could lead to overflow/underflow.
metadata.name: integer-overflow-underflow

metadata.description:
DiceGame.rollDice() (services/uploads/90dd9059b9334d50aeddd9e8392e49fb.sol#26-45) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- player.transfer(prizeWon) (services/uploads/90dd9059b9334d50aeddd9e8392e49fb.sol#35)
metadata.markdown:
[DiceGame.rollDice()](services/uploads/90dd9059b9334d50aeddd9e8392e49fb.sol#L26-L45) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- [player.transfer(prizeWon)](services/uploads/90dd9059b9334d50aeddd9e8392e49fb.sol#L35)

metadata.description: DiceGame.calculateRollResult() (services/uploads/90dd9059b9334d50aeddd9e8392e49fb.sol#47-51) uses a weak PRNG: "roll = uint256(keccak256(bytes)(abi.encodePacked(blockhash(uint256)(block.number - 1),nonce))) % ROLL_MODULO (services/uploads/90dd9059b9334d50aeddd9e8392e49fb.sol#48)"

DiceGame.prizeAmount (services/uploads/90dd9059b9334d50aeddd9e8392e49fb.sol#12) is written in both
	prizeAmount = (address(this).balance * PRIZE_RESET_SHARE) / PERCENTAGE_DIVISOR (services/uploads/90dd9059b9334d50aeddd9e8392e49fb.sol#38)
	prizeAmount = prizeFundShare (services/uploads/90dd9059b9334d50aeddd9e8392e49fb.sol#44)

DiceGame.rollDice().player (services/uploads/90dd9059b9334d50aeddd9e8392e49fb.sol#33) lacks a zero-check on :
		- player.transfer(prizeWon) (services/uploads/90dd9059b9334d50aeddd9e8392e49fb.sol#35)
		- winner = player (services/uploads/90dd9059b9334d50aeddd9e8392e49fb.sol#36)
solc-0.8.0 is not recommended for deployment
metadata.markdown: solc-0.8.0 is not recommended for deployment

metadata.description:
Reentrancy in DiceGame.rollDice() (services/uploads/90dd9059b9334d50aeddd9e8392e49fb.sol#26-45):
	External calls:
	- player.transfer(prizeWon) (services/uploads/90dd9059b9334d50aeddd9e8392e49fb.sol#35)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- prizeAmount = (address(this).balance * PRIZE_RESET_SHARE) / PERCENTAGE_DIVISOR (services/uploads/90dd9059b9334d50aeddd9e8392e49fb.sol#38)
	- prizeAmount = prizeFundShare (services/uploads/90dd9059b9334d50aeddd9e8392e49fb.sol#44)
	- winner = player (services/uploads/90dd9059b9334d50aeddd9e8392e49fb.sol#36)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- DiceRolled(player,rollResult,true,prizeWon) (services/uploads/90dd9059b9334d50aeddd9e8392e49fb.sol#37)
metadata.markdown:
Reentrancy in [DiceGame.rollDice()](services/uploads/90dd9059b9334d50aeddd9e8392e49fb.sol#L26-L45):
	External calls:
	- [player.transfer(prizeWon)](services/uploads/90dd9059b9334d50aeddd9e8392e49fb.sol#L35)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [prizeAmount = (address(this).balance * PRIZE_RESET_SHARE) / PERCENTAGE_DIVISOR](services/uploads/90dd9059b9334d50aeddd9e8392e49fb.sol#L38)
	- [prizeAmount = prizeFundShare](services/uploads/90dd9059b9334d50aeddd9e8392e49fb.sol#L44)
	- [winner = player](services/uploads/90dd9059b9334d50aeddd9e8392e49fb.sol#L36)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [DiceRolled(player,rollResult,true,prizeWon)](services/uploads/90dd9059b9334d50aeddd9e8392e49fb.sol#L37)

metadata.description: DiceGame.PRIZE_PERCENTAGE (services/uploads/90dd9059b9334d50aeddd9e8392e49fb.sol#7) is never used in DiceGame (services/uploads/90dd9059b9334d50aeddd9e8392e49fb.sol#4-57)
DiceGame.PRIZE_FUND_PERCENTAGE (services/uploads/90dd9059b9334d50aeddd9e8392e49fb.sol#8) is never used in DiceGame (services/uploads/90dd9059b9334d50aeddd9e8392e49fb.sol#4-57)
